verbose_text: To test if knocking down individual proteasome components in adult fly muscle can compromise the Daw or Myo overexpression induced lifespan extension effect, we built a UAS-Myo or a UAS-Daw transgene and a UAS-Rpn1 RNAi transgene into the same fly line and expressed these transgenes together in adult fly muscle, and the survivorship of these flies was monitored and compared (XREF_FIG D, E; Table S9).
